message.raw: Added differential operator, and then put in nonlinear terms for RB problem.  Note:  Explicit methods (for the nonlinear terms) easily become unstable!  You need to make sure the timestep is small enough, otherwise everything blows in the nonlinear regime.  Adaptive step sizes will help, but I wanted to make sure everything worked correctly using uniform timesteps.
